diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Hypertension
prevention_measures: Maintain a healthy weight.
Eat a balanced diet low in sodium.
Exercise regularly.
Limit alcohol consumption.
Manage stress through meditation or yoga.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Diabetes
prevention_measures: Control your weight.
Follow a healthy diet with plenty of fiber.
Get regular physical activity.
Avoid sugary drinks and processed foods.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Common Cold
prevention_measures: Wash hands frequently with soap and water.
Avoid touching your face.
Stay away from people who are sick.
Disinfect frequently touched surfaces.
Get enough sleep.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Asthma
prevention_measures: Avoid asthma triggers like pollen, dust mites, and pet dander.
Use an air purifier.
Avoid smoking and secondhand smoke.
Get a flu shot to prevent respiratory infections.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Arthritis
prevention_measures: Maintain a healthy weight to reduce stress on joints.
Exercise regularly to strengthen muscles around joints.
Protect joints from injury.
Eat a diet rich in antioxidants.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Influenza
prevention_measures: Get an annual flu vaccine.
Wash your hands often.
Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth.
Stay home when you are sick.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Migraine
prevention_measures: Identify and avoid triggers (e.g., certain foods, stress, lack of sleep).
Maintain a regular sleep schedule.
Manage stress with relaxation techniques.
Stay hydrated.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Pneumonia
prevention_measures: Get vaccinated against pneumonia and the flu.
Wash your hands frequently.
Avoid smoking.
Maintain a healthy lifestyle to boost your immune system.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Measles
prevention_measures: Get the MMR (measles, mumps, and rubella) vaccine.
Avoid contact with infected people.
Wash hands frequently.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Hepatitis
prevention_measures: Get vaccinated against Hepatitis A and B.
Practice safe sex.
Avoid sharing needles or personal items like razors.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Bronchitis
prevention_measures: Avoid smoking and exposure to secondhand smoke.
Wash your hands often.
Get a flu vaccine.
Avoid touching your face with unwashed hands.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Anemia
prevention_measures: Eat a diet rich in iron (e.g., red meat, beans, spinach).
Consume foods high in vitamin C to help with iron absorption.
Eat foods with a lot of B12 and folate.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Dengue Fever
prevention_measures: Use mosquito repellent.
Wear long sleeves and pants.
Use screens on windows and doors.
Eliminate stagnant water where mosquitoes can breed.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Typhoid Fever
prevention_measures: Get vaccinated.
Drink bottled or boiled water.
Wash hands before eating and after using the bathroom.
Avoid raw fruits and vegetables.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Tuberculosis
prevention_measures: Get the BCG vaccine in high-risk areas.
Cover your mouth and nose when you cough or sneeze.
Avoid close contact with people who have active TB.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Malaria
prevention_measures: Take antimalarial medications when traveling to high-risk areas.
Use insect repellent.
Sleep under mosquito nets treated with insecticide.
Wear long sleeves and pants.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Cholera
prevention_measures: Drink and use safe water (bottled, boiled, or chlorinated).
Wash hands frequently with soap and water.
Cook food thoroughly and eat it while hot.
Avoid raw fruits and vegetables.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Conjunctivitis
prevention_measures: Wash your hands often.
Avoid touching your eyes.
Don't share eye makeup or contact lenses.
Use clean towels and washcloths.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Tetanus
prevention_measures: Get the tetanus vaccine (Tdap or Td).
Clean all wounds and cuts thoroughly.
Avoid walking barefoot outdoors.

diseases_with_prevention_measures.name: Eczema
prevention_measures: Moisturize your skin regularly.
Avoid triggers like harsh soaps, certain fabrics, or allergens.
Use a humidifier to keep the air from being too dry.
Take short, lukewarm showers.
